directions: In a medium, microwave safe bowl, mix cream cheese, chili without beans and diced tomatoes with green chile peppers.
Microwave cream cheese mixture on high 1 minute. Remove from microwave, stir and repeat until the mixture is hot and thoroughly blended.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, drained
title: Chili Dip
